bibl.title: Polish Archaeology in the Mediterranean. VIII. Reports 1996.
bibl.note: Rapports d'activités en Égypte (Alexandrie, Le Caire, Deir el-Bahari, Marina el-Alamein, Naqlun, Saqqara), à Chypre, au Liban, au Soudan et en Syrie.
bibl.seg: Polish Archaeology in the Mediterranean. VIII. Reports 1996.
Warsaw, University of Warsaw, Polish Centre of Mediterranean Archaeology, 1997, 8°, 211 pp., figg., plans.
